price: نو له هغه (حيوان) څخه خورئ چې د الله نوم پرې ياد شوى وي، كه چېرى يې په آيتونو باور لرونكي ياست.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كُنتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā dhukira us'mu al-lahi ʿalayhi in kuntum biāyātihi mu'minīna
